name: Thargoid Attack
description:
Calling all independent pilots! 

The Thargoids are back in far greater numbers than we've ever seen. Several stations have been severely damaged, and anarchy is spreading through the Bubble like wildfire.

That's where you come in, commander! Take on the waves of Thargoid ships and stand up to our invaders. We've already fitted your ship with AX cannons - time is of the essence.

How many Thargoids can you take on at once in your trusty Cobra?

This game was submitted for a university assignment. The brief was to create a 2.5D Space Invader game using Unreal Engine 4.
